actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Energy Conservation Policy Act to require Federal agencies to take certain actions to reduce employee vehicle consumption, and for other purposes.
short_title: Reduce Government Fuel Consumption Act of 2005

summary.text: Reduce Government Fuel Consumption Act of 2005 - Amends the National Energy Conservation Policy Act to require each federal agency to take necessary action to reduce by at least 10% vehicle fuel consumption by agency employees (other than fuel used for military purposes).

titles.title: Reduce Government Fuel Consumption Act of 2005
A bill to amend the National Energy Conservation Policy Act to require Federal agencies to take certain actions to reduce employee vehicle consumption, and for other purposes.
